pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Handbook of Statistical Analyses Using R (1st Edition) // Functions, data sets, analyses and examples from the book ''A Handbook of Statistical Analyses Using R'' (Brian S. Everitt and Torsten Hothorn, Chapman Hall/CRC, 2006). The first chapter of the book, which is entitled ''An Introduction to R'', is completely included in this package, for all other chapters, a vignette containing all data analyses is available.
